text: Anata gata no naka, onkei o atae rare fuyū de nōryoku arumononiha, sono kinshin ya, hinja to arrā no michi no tame ijū shita-sha-tachi no tame ni kisha shinai to, chikawa sete wa naranai. Kare-ra o yurushi ōme ni mite yaru ga ī. Arrā ga anata gata o yurusa reru koto o nozomanai no ka. Hontōni arrā wa kan'yō ni shite jihibukaku ara reru
